meaning:
สินทรัพย์

sentence: By the end of 2020 the company had assets of 200 billion dollars.

meaning: ธนบัตร
sentence: And occasionally small finds, some coins; a banknote in a pocket.

sentence: Payment by cheque or cashier’s cheque or bank draft dated within September 30, 2021.

meaning: ล้มละลาย
sentence: Then he declares the company bankrupt before paying off the promissory note, canceling the debt.

meaning: การล้มละลาย
sentence: I have to summarize all those cases in bankruptcy over there.

meaning: ผู้รับผลประโยชน์
sentence: The beneficiary will receive money on the same day or on the next working day.

meaning: ผลประโยชน์
sentence: Mutual trading will be the biggest benefit of both nations.

meaning: ใบแจ้งหนี้
sentence: This is the bill from the hotel where we stayed.

meaning: เงินสด
sentence: The shop charges less if the customer pays in cash.

sentence: There is a charge for the use of the swimming pool.

sentence: Any customs or import duties are charged once the parcel reaches its destination country.

meaning: เงินตรา
sentence: The bank can supply you with foreign currency.

meaning: หนี้, หนี้สิน
sentence: She had debts of over £200,000.

meaning: หักบัญชี
sentence: Please authorise us to debit your account and, where possible, give a day-time telephone number in case of query.

meaning: การชะลอตัวทางเศรษฐกิจ
sentence: Obviously a process of balanced deflation would entail no alteration of the real wage rate.

meaning: ความต้องการ
sentence: It follows that their demand for bank deposits is also growing at twice the rate of growth of nominal income.

meaning: เงินฝาก
sentence: I’d like to make a deposit into my savings account.

meaning: การบริจาค
sentence: Any donation however small, will be gratefully received.

meaning: ได้รับ, ได้กำไร, มีรายได้
sentence: He earns nearly £10,000 a year.

meaning: รายได้, ผลกำไร
sentence: The company’s earnings have dropped by 4% in the first quarter.

meaning: เกี่ยวกับเศรษฐกิจ
sentence: Economic growth is slow.

meaning: ประหยัด
sentence: Tim’s a very economical person, . He always looks around for the best buys.

meaning: เศรษฐศาสตร์
sentence: She received a master’s degree in agricultural economics and a doctorate in economics and marketing from Chulalongkorn University.

sentence: Not insuring your belongings is a false economy

meaning: ภาวะข้าวยากหมากแพง, ความอดอยาก
sentence: Millions of people in Africa continue to die because of war and famine.

meaning: ค่าธรรมเนียม

meaning: กองทุน
sentence: The government agreed to create a fund to help develop rural areas.

meaning: การระดมทุน
sentence: Now she has joined the Breakthrough fundraising drive to build a research centre in Thailand.

meaning: มรดก
sentence: Our aim is to make the performing arts, museums and our heritage accessible to all.

meaning: รายได้

meaning: การขยายตัว, ภาวะเงินเฟ้อ
sentence: The inflation rate rose to 4.5% last month.

meaning: ใบอนุญาต

meaning: เกี่ยวกับเงิน, ทางการเงิน
sentence: There’s only one conclusion to make about this data on monetary growth.

sentence: Greater resources are needed to meet these obligations.

meaning: เงินเบิกเกินบัญชี
sentence: They had been given borrowing and overdraft facilities.

meaning: การได้กำไร
sentence: They plan to increase profitability by making the factory more efficient.

meaning: ซึ่งได้ผลกำไร
sentence: It is a profitable business but there is evidence of some slack time, perhaps this is a learning curve effect.

sentence: There is deep recession in the UK.

sentence: Keep your receipt in case you want to bring it back.

sentence: They’re demanding repayment for the cost of the uniforms.

sentence: No order for costs save legal aid taxation.
